Exploratory analysis

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(readxl)
library(widyr)
library(janitor)
library(factoextra)
library(FactoMineR)
library(rgl)

theme_set(theme_light())

Cucuteni_pXRF <- read_excel("Cucuteni_pXRF.xlsx", sheet = "toate fara 15 RSD>10")
Cucuteni_pXRF <- as_tibble(Cucuteni_pXRF) |> 
  mutate_if(is.character, as.factor) |> 
  mutate_if(is.double, as.numeric)

df <- Cucuteni_pXRF[-15,] |> #sample 15 eliminated due to errors in the analysis process
as_tibble()

View(df)

df_long <- 
  Cucuteni_pXRF |> 
  pivot_longer(
    cols = -c("SAMPLE", "TIP"),
    names_to = "Elemente",
    values_to = "Procentaje"
    ) |> 
  unite("Sample_Element",
        c("SAMPLE", "Elemente"),
        sep = ".",
        remove = F) |> 
  mutate_if(is.character, as.factor) |> 
  as_tibble()

cors <- df_long |> 
  group_by(SAMPLE) |> 
  pairwise_cor(Elemente, Procentaje, sort = TRUE)
  
cors_tibble <- 
  cors |> 
  as_tibble() |> 
  distinct(item1, .keep_all = T) |> 
  unite(Cor_Pairs,
        c(item1, item2),
        sep = "_vs_",
        remove = F
        ) |>
  mutate_if(is.character, as.factor) |> 
  top_n(20, abs(correlation)) |> 
  mutate(Cor_Pairs = fct_reorder(Cor_Pairs, correlation))

  ggplot(cors_tibble, aes(correlation, Cor_Pairs)) +
  geom_point()
```

Exploratory analysis in view of clustering


Clusters

```{r}
gradient_col <-  list(low = "black", mid = "white",high = "red")

pca_df_ind <- as.data.frame(pca_df$ind)
pca_selection <- as.data.frame(pca_df_selection$ind)

cluster_tendency_pca_df <- get_clust_tendency(pca_df_ind[,1:3], n = 10, gradient = gradient_col)      
cluster_tendency_pca_df #0.58

cluster_tendency_pca_selection <- get_clust_tendency(pca_selection[,1:3], n = 10, gradient = gradient_col)      
cluster_tendency_pca_selection #0.58


set.seed(2024)

clust_tests <- eclust(pca_df_ind[,1:3],
                               FUNcluster = "agnes",
                               k = 5,
                               hc_metric = "pearson",
                               hc_method = "average"
                               )

fviz_silhouette(clust_tests) # 2clust=0.7; 3clust=0.71_wrong; 4clust=0.74_wrong;
                                              #5clust=0.76; 6clust=0.69_wrong; 7clust=0.73_wrong; 8clust=0.7; 9clust=0.72
dendrogram_tests <- fviz_dend(clust_tests)
dendrogram_tests


export_clus <- clust_tests$cluster
df$clusters <- as.factor(export_clus)
View(df)
```
